item.title: Report X-2025010436
item.description:
Report X-2025010436

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-13T21:12:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-20
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A LEAKING AIR DANGEROUS GOODS PACKAGE THAT WAS MARKED AND LABELLED AS UN1824, SODIUM HYDROXIDE SOLUTION WITH A CLASS 8 CORROSIVE DIAMOND AND IATA SHIPPERS DECLARATION FOR DANGEROUS GOODS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE INNER 3.6 LITER CONTAINERS. TWO CONTAINERS WERE ENTIRELY EMPTY. ONE CONTAINER WAS STILL INTACT AND NOT LEAKING. THE ENTIRE PACKAGE AND CONTENTS WERE DISPOSED OF FOLLOWING DISPOSAL PROCEDURES. THE PACKAGE HAD ALREADY PASSED AN ACCEPTANCE AUDIT AT THE ORIGIN FACILITY IN INDIANAPOLIS ON 18-DECEMBER-2024 AND WAS TRAILERED TO MARYLAND WHERE THE LEAK WAS DISCOVERED.
